column1: Little Goat Diner////The best thing we had (and what I have been craving every day since) were the Fat Elvis waffles.  The Parathas Burrito was also very good.  The hash browns were awesome- they were shredded
column2: so were almost like shoestring french fries but in the form of hash browns- YUM!   The mac n cheese was delicious- the cheese they used was so good
column3: and the crumbs on top were the perfect touch.  The cheesy garlic french bread was so good
column4: and even better was the tomato chutney type of thing that it came with
